definition: variant of 確|确[que4]/variant of 埆[que4]
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)

sentences.english: It's proving very difficult to peg him down to a definite date for completion.
sentences.chinese: 要规定他限期完成确是十分困难的。

sentences.english: But philosophically the approaches are identical.
sentences.chinese: 但是哲学上的途径确是相同的。

sentences.english: It is insanity to drive a car without any brakes .
sentences.chinese: 驾驶没有煞车的汽车确是愚不可及。

sentences.english: Scenery near the West Lake is actually a love picture.
sentences.chinese: 西湖边的风景，确是一幅爱情的画卷。

sentences.english: But why diminish all this with clunky dialogue?
sentences.chinese: 但是，为什么这部电影的对白确是笨拙？

sentences.english: It is no doubt a pleasure to explore the wonders of nature with children who are so innocent and lovely.
sentences.chinese: 与天真烂漫的儿童一起接触大自然确是赏心乐事。

sentences.english: So were the People of Noah before them for they wickedly transgressed.
sentences.chinese: 以前，我毁灭了努哈的宗族，他们确是悖逆的民众。

sentences.english: But looking ahead, I found there's nothing but street lamps at the turn of mountain path.
sentences.chinese: 我抬头望时，确是山路转折处的路灯。

sentences.english: But for other astronomers, interstellar dust is useful in its own right.
sentences.chinese: 但对于其他天文学家而言，星际尘埃自身确是有用的。

sentences.english: Indeed the old version really is one of many otaku are recognized thought of the film artifact.
sentences.chinese: 的确老版本确是众多宅男们认可的看片神器。

sentences.english: Even so, the cap must fit, and only confirmed Rightists should BE laBElled as such.
sentences.chinese: 但是也要扣得对，确是右派才给他扣上右派这顶帽子。

sentences.english: Grape is indeed a simple-hearted woman.
sentences.chinese: 葡萄确是个憨呼呼的村姑。

sentences.english: This year, property markets in Beijing and Shanghai are sizzling.
sentences.chinese: 今年在北京和上海的地产市场确是火热。

sentences.english: A road in the mountainous area was a real challenge.
sentences.chinese: 在山区修筑公路确是艰钜的事。

sentences.english: “This is a misunderstanding,” said Yang, who had a “director of admission” business card at the fair.
sentences.chinese: 然而，在博览会上他确是持有“招生办主任”的名片。

sentences.english: The first time, the chill crescent moon was really chill.
sentences.chinese: 那第一次，带着寒气的月牙儿确是带着寒气。

definition: equivalent to either 是[shi4] or 就是[jiu4 shi4]
really/as expected/sure enough/if indeed.../if it's really...
to be bound to/to be sure to
